CONTACT_PAGE.TITLE: Contact - FamilyNest
CONTACT_PAGE.INTRO: For any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please feel free to contact me.
CONTACT_PAGE.BY_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: The fastest way to contact me directly.
CONTACT_PAGE.ON_GITHUB_DESCRIPTION: Explore the source code and follow the project's evolution.
CONTACT_PAGE.FOOTER_NOTE: Responses usually within 24-48 hours. Thank you for your interest!

LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.TITLE: Legal Notice - FamilyNest
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.INTRO: This legal notice governs the use of FamilyNest.
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_CONTENT: The content of this site is the property of PLLX76 and is protected by intellectual property laws.
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_LICENSE: The source code is available under the AGPLv3 open-source license.
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.PRIVACY_CONTENT: This site does not collect any personal data.
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.LIABILITY_CONTENT: The information provided on this site is for informational purposes only and does not engage the editor's liability.
LEGAL_NOTICE_PAGE.APPLICABLE_LAW_CONTENT: This site is governed by French law.

PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.TITLE: Privacy Policy - FamilyNest
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.INTRO: We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This privacy policy explains how we handle data on this site.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.DATA_COLLECTED_CONTENT: This site does not collect any personal data. If we use tools like Google Analytics, the collected data is anonymous and used only for statistical purposes.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PRIVACY_GUARANTEE: No personal identifiers are stored in our systems. All data related to your identity is managed exclusively by your login provider.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.DATA_USAGE_CONTENT: The anonymous data collected is used to improve user experience and understand how visitors interact with the site.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.COOKIES_CONTENT: We do not use cookies to track users. However, if we use tools like Google Analytics, cookies may be used to collect anonymous data.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.CONTACT_CONTENT: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at the following address:

TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.TITLE: Terms of Service - FamilyNest
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.INTRO: By using FamilyNest, you agree to the following terms of service. Please read them carefully.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_CONTENT: FamilyNest is an open-source tool for creating and sharing family trees. It is provided free of charge and without warranty.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.ACCEPTABLE_USE_CONTENT: You agree to use this site in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You must not use this site for illegal or unauthorized activities.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_CONTENT: The content of this site is the property of PaulExplorer and is protected by intellectual property laws.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.LICENSE_NOTE_CONTENT: The source code is available under the AGPLv3 open-source license. You are free to view, use, and modify the source code in accordance with the terms of this license.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.LIABILITY_LIMITATION_CONTENT: The information provided on this site is for informational purposes only and does not engage the editor's liability. We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use this site.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_PAGE.CONDITIONS_MODIFICATION_CONTENT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect upon their publication on this page.

HERO.TITLE: Create your collaborative family tree
HERO.TAGLINE: An open-source project for you and your family. Free, simple, and entirely under your control.

CONTEXT.TITLE: An Open Source and Collaborative Project
CONTEXT.MODULAR_TEXT: A full-stack development demonstration: modular architecture, authentication management, and collaboration with a database.
CONTEXT.COLLABORATION_TEXT: A tool designed to allow multiple users to create and share family trees collaboratively and securely.
CONTEXT.COMMUNITY_TEXT: An example of a complete open-source web application: modular front-end and backend with Supabase. Use it, modify it, and contribute to its improvement.

FOOTER.CREDIT: Open source and non-commercial project ¬© 2024-2025 FamilyNest

ARCHITECTURE.TITLE: How does it work?
ARCHITECTURE.MODULAR_ARCHITECTURE_TEXT: FamilyNest is an example backend server that you can connect to the front-end. It's a decoupled architecture demonstration.

OPEN_SOURCE_SECTION.TITLE: Transparent and open
OPEN_SOURCE_SECTION.IMPORTANT_NOTE_TEXT: This site is not specifically privacy-focused by default, but since it's open source, you can self-host it to have full control over your data.

FINAL_CTA.TITLE: Ready to explore?
FINAL_CTA.SUBTITLE: The code is open, and you can start creating your tree right now.

ILLUSTRATION.TITLE: Manage your family tree
ILLUSTRATION.SUBTITLE: Organize, visualize, and share your family trees in a collaborative environment.

LOGIN_FORM.TITLE: Log in to your account
LOGIN_FORM.SUBTITLE: Please enter your credentials to access your space and start exploring your family tree.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.TITLE: Reset Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.SUBTITLE: Enter your email to receive a reset link.

SIGNUP_FORM.TITLE: Create an Account
SIGNUP_FORM.SUBTITLE: Join our platform to create and share your family tree with your family.

MESSAGES.SIGNUP_SUCCESS: Signup successful! Please check your email to confirm your account, then log in.
MESSAGES.JOIN_TREE_PROMPT: Please log in or create an account to join the tree.
MESSAGES.RESET_LINK_SENT: A reset link has been sent to your email address.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in.

FORM.TITLE: Reset Your Password
FORM.SUBTITLE: Please enter your new password below.

MESSAGES.INVALID_TOKEN: The access token is missing or invalid.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_MISMATCH: Passwords do not match or are empty.

DELETE_SECTION.TITLE: Delete Account
DELETE_SECTION.WARNING: ‚ö†Ô∏è This action is irreversible. All your data, including your family trees, will be permanently deleted.

DELETE_MODAL.TITLE: Delete Account?
DELETE_MODAL.BODY:
Are you absolutely sure you want to permanently delete your account? 

This action cannot be undone. All your data, including your family trees, will be permanently removed.
